events.message: I purchased a jacket last week but it doesn't fit and I would like to get a refund. How can I return it and get my money back?
The case has been classified under the Refund cluster based on the customer's request for a return and money back.
Your refund request has been assigned to our returns specialist team for further assistance.
Hello! I understand you'd like to return your jacket. Iâ€™m here to help you through the refund process.
Could you please provide the order number and confirm if the jacket is unused and in original packaging?
My order number is 789456123. The jacket is new and I have the original packaging intact, ready to return.
Thank you for the details. You can send the jacket back using the prepaid label I will email you shortly, and we will process your refund within 5 business days after we receive it.
Thanks for the quick response and the prepaid label information. That sounds perfect!
We have received your returned jacket and processed your refund. The amount should reflect on your payment method shortly.
Just checking in to confirm that you received the refund and if there is anything else we can assist you with.
Since your refund has been processed and there are no further issues reported, we are closing this case. Thank you for contacting support.
Please take a moment to fill out a short survey to rate your satisfaction with our refund process and support.
